examples:
$ sfdx dxutils:eventlogs --targetusername myOrg@example.com
        Hello myname
        Calculating packages

$ sfdx dxutils:eventlogs -u myOrg@example.com -d THIS_WEEK -e LightningPageView
        Hello myname
        Calculating packages ...
        You have 130 metadata types in your org I can scan

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

dxutils:pull.description: Pull changes from your connected org and generate an xml or autodownload metadata based on last modified date
examples:
$ sfdx dxutils:pull --targetusername myOrg@example.com
        Hello myname
        Calculating packages

$ sfdx dxutils:pull -u myOrg@example.com -a
        Hello myname
        Calculating packages ...
        You have 130 metadata types in your org I can scan

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

days.name: days
days.description: Please select the number of days we need to specify for getting org details

autodownload.name: autodownload
autodownload.description: AutoDownload the files using sfdx force:source:retrieve

autoclean.name: autoclean
autoclean.description: Automatically clean the files that are downloaded with sfdx dxutils:pull
